name: FIVE NIGHTS AT LOUIE NIKAS DAYCARE
name_original: FIVE NIGHTS AT LOUIE NIKAS DAYCARE
description:
This game is based of FNAF obviously and its made out of the phasmophobia map. I created the game using FNAF MAKER from here : https://gamejolt.com/games/FNaF_Maker/672709

Sadly when you get the game you will have to disable real time protection because of certain files in the game that make it work. I have created this game and downloaded it myself so don't worry its not a virus.
